How to Use? Copyright notice - Wolcano Music, does not use its own server or provider and it only provide access to other services and all these services have no relation with Wolcano Music.\n - Wolcano Music is an Android music player which has comprehensive search engine and it is focused on user interface and easy to use.\n - Wolcano Music respects the intellectual property rights and help removal of the content from the search engine as quickly as possible. If you are a copyright owner or a representative send us an email with your name and we will get back to you as soon as possible then we will perform filtering process on the search engine. Please do not send false notice. In an emergency, the process may take a while. Thank you for your understanding.\n You can press yes if you want to send email to us. The playing notification provides actions for play/pause etc. Rate App Share App Rate the app on Google Play. Share this app to your friends.
